text:
Urs Egger (1955 – January 19, 2020) was a Swiss movie and television director and journalist. From 1974 to 1997, he worked for the Swiss "Neue Zürcher Zeitung" and the Australian "Cinema Papers" as a correspondent. His best known movies were "Kinder der Landstrasse" (1992) and "Opernball" (1998).
Egger died on January 19, 2020 at the age of 66.
